jason.functions

Class Min

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.asSemantics.DefaultArithFunction
      • jason.functions.Min
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArithFunction, java.io.Serializable

    public class Min
extends DefaultArithFunction

    Function: math.min(N1,N2): encapsulates java Math.min(N1,N2). It also returns the min number of a list.

    Examples:

    • math.min(1,3): returns 1.
    • math.min([3,a,"s",5]): returns 3.
    See Also:
    Max, Serialized Form
